text: Isa ibane mariyama balalenah he allaha amadera palanakarta amadera prati akasa theke khadyabharti khanca abatarana karuna. Ta amadera jan'ye arthat, amadera prathama o parabarti sabara jan'ye anandotsaba habe ebam apanara paksa theke ekati nidarsana habe. Apani amadera ruyi dina. Apani'i sresta ruyidata.
